website_summaries.verdict: This toy set featuring Superman and his friends from the Justice League consist of nicely painted, bendy, and tough figures that will survive the roughest of playtimes.
pros: 4-pack of bendable Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, and Green Lantern figures in their classic comic book costumes
cons: Kids may not recognize their retro costumes

customer_reviews.title: Well made toys
customer_reviews.text: The item looks well made and doesn't look like the figures have Down syndrome like one poster mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: sreynolds09

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done...
customer_reviews.text: I have a few expensive collectible action figures, so of course my young son wanted to play with them. I tried to accommodate him, but when he ripped the cape of Michael Keaton Batman I knew I had to find him some superhero toys he could play hard with. These rubber figures aren't of the best quality, but since they're bendy my son hasn't broken them like most toys he plays with. Personally, I love the retro paint job they have. And this box set is a great value, these same toys bought individually are way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Scalph

customer_reviews.title: Bendable superheroes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very colorful fun set of bendable superheroes!! We got these for our son for his batcave and he loves them!!! You can stretch and bend them and so far their holding up great!! I would recommend these, you can't find them in a regular store!!
customer_reviews.author: leeann

customer_reviews.title: Nice action figures
customer_reviews.text: These action figures look old school, but they are really nice quality rubber. I run an after school program and have lots of 5 to 10 year old children play with them. They seem to really enjoy them and I definitely felt like it was a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Woman can't look you directly in the eyes...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them.. but if he was older I think he would be alarmed about Wonder Woman's eyes... they are looking in opposite directions. I also thought Superman was looking a little ragged. All in all.. good for a child without discerning tastes.. probably not good for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: indestructible plastic toys with recognizable super hero designs
customer_reviews.text: It does the job: indestructible plastic toys with recognizable super hero designs. These were bought for a public office for kids to play with in a waiting area and can be wiped down. Paint detail is cheaply done however for this intended use it's fine but not if you're giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these in the past and my kids loved them. The old ones did get thrown out bc their faces were worn down and the fabric capes got torn. The batman actually had a metal peice sticking out of his foot. My boys do love these though. They are well played with.
customer_reviews.author: MountainMomma

customer_reviews.title: Happy in Ohio
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old grand son loves these! I bought them b/c he breaks everything he touches. These he hasn't broken and plays with them constantly. Who doesn't love a bendy toy? I played with these kinds of things when I was little in the 70's so I knew they'd be a hit. The figures are actually bigger than I anticipated, so happy surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hommon

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old son love these. He plays with them in the bath ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son love these. He plays with them in the bath and they have held up fine (had them for 2 months.)
customer_reviews.author: Megan Seiler

customer_reviews.title: hmm
customer_reviews.text: Figures are hard to bend. A little,sad not what was expected. Figures are real stiff and not easy to bend or move,
customer_reviews.author: BusyNana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sect for PICU Patient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the PICU where my daughter works. I don’t know how well it worked out for the recipient, but the hospital was delighted to receive the gift. It appeared to be very nice, as pictured. I hope the recipient enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good action figure set for kids. Super sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fuller

customer_reviews.title: He loved the superheroes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Superheroes set for a Birthday Present. It was a huge success. He loved them all and went on to explain who they were to me. I loved the fact that the set was of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: is nice.
customer_reviews.text: These go everywhere with my son. He loves them and that they are bendable. They are one solid piece so we don't have to worry about the limbs or head popping off, which for us, is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Myranda

customer_reviews.title: My 4 and a half year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are great. My 4 year old loves them. The quality is great and the price is really good. If you need to get superhero toys for your kids then you can't get much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: brainiac723

customer_reviews.title: My nephew love's DC.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for Christmas. He loved it. Been playing with his new action figures ever since. Big Superhero fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine E Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: We were Surprised at the nice quality and nice appearance of each piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old grandson loved his super hero's
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old grandson loved his super hero's, very pleased with the transaction and would shop here again, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: letsbejeweled

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for our 2 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our 2 year old girl. The rubber is tough and they bend enough to make a child happy. The paint is not perfect and rubs off quick in a few places but not a big deal. We have had them over a month and they have held up well to intense play.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My grandon who is 5 was a little disappointed that they were 'bendy' figures but he still plays ...
customer_reviews.text: It was just OK. My grandon who is 5 was a little disappointed that they were 'bendy' figures but he still plays with them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cannon

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT bendable and do NOT stand up. Very, very frustrating for a toddler. I would return them but they've already been opened. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. Im glad i took a chance on ordering these. You cant find these in stores, the whole set. Perfect size for child.
customer_reviews.author: KAM

customer_reviews.title: great size for price
customer_reviews.text: great gift for grandson. He loves the size and the fact that you can bend them.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: I loved the quality and she is still playing with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put on my daughter's birthday cake. They are larger than your typical birthday toppers, but I already knew that. However, they made the cake look fabulous because they were bigger than usual. I loved the quality and she is still playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great simple superhero toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 and a half and is just getting really into superheroes. This was a perfect pack - simple without too many frills - for our purpose. The toys are only slightly bendable, but seem fairly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how rubbery this is
customer_reviews.text: I love how rubbery this is, it's very flexible for a 3 year old and a 19 month old to play with
customer_reviews.author: YouLik3

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: My daughter managed to detach the capes in a matter of minutes, without really playing that rough. They are a decent set, but not particularly sturdy and I do not expect them to last long. Unfortunately, not a huge amount of options for Wonder Woman toys out there.
customer_reviews.author: HLGStrider

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad for the price. The characters are a bit sloppy but nothing a toddler would even notice.
customer_reviews.author: Bobeena

customer_reviews.title: I was glad to find these with prime shipping close to Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find these with prime shipping close to Christmas. The figures are as pictured, but they seem a little pricey for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: A Hit!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed these figures immensely and took them to school for show and tell.
customer_reviews.author: alienist

customer_reviews.title: Super hero pack
customer_reviews.text: Love the super hero quite a few of them and great priçe.My grandson will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to Super Heros collection!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my grandson's Super Hero collection. He's a big Green Lantern fan so was happy to receive these!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Cush

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them and it's not something he can break!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fun pack for a great price. It's particularly hard to find this version of Wonder Woman which my daughter loved, so we bought the full pack, and she's enjoyed playing with all of the other super heroes!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These are great and my grandson loves them. Fit in well with his birthday "Justice League" theme. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw 43

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these figures. They move well and withstand rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Action figures look awesome. Bought these for my son and wife. My wife likes the classic Wonder Woman. Figures look vintage which is the coolest part about them.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for little kids
customer_reviews.text: My nephew really likes these action figures and according to my sister he has playing with them daily since they were gifted on Christmas eve.

customer_reviews.title: Nice figures

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are the old rubber toy

customer_reviews.text: My 3 y.o. grandson is very into superheroes, so this boxed set fit the bill perfectly. He was so excited to see so many heroes in one place. He is playing and enjoying them daily.

customer_reviews.title: ... can't find in the stores anymore and my Grandson loved them. They won't snap and break like the ...
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but something you can't find in the stores anymore and my Grandson loved them. They won't snap and break like the plastics you buy in the stores now these are bendable. Shipped in a timely manner.

customer_reviews.title: He was absolutely delighted and ready to keep he characters within reach almost ...

customer_reviews.title: Fun toys not very flexible

customer_reviews.author: JanetteL

customer_reviews.title: They're okay.
customer_reviews.text: For me, there is something lacking with these figures. I don't know what. Maybe it's the lack of articulation (you can KIND OF bend them around, but it never looks natural, and they always go back to the way they were). Maybe it's the time period - I prefer the more contemporary versions of these heroes. My son likes them okay, but he doesn't know any better: he's only 2 and a half. They're fine. IF you love toys that you can't position, who are difficult to make stand up, and are from the 1950's and 60's, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kiddo

customer_reviews.title: They are very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son takes these little heros everywhere. The tub, swimming, the park, etc. They are very good quality!

customer_reviews.title: The figurines are great. The actual box was quite beaten up
customer_reviews.text: The figurines are great. The actual box was quite beaten up, though. This was a little disappointing since it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal C Corbin

customer_reviews.title: ... top of the list of my 3 year olds favorite toys. Perfect size soft
customer_reviews.text: This is by far at the top of the list of my 3 year olds favorite toys. Perfect size soft, flexible, rubber material withstands young play. The capes are sturdy enough to last. My son has taken to bringing them with him to nap time and I don't have to be worried something will poke or scratch him. I am very pleased with this purchase, timely delivery, and product as described. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bmill

customer_reviews.title: Great old school superhero set
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them. Plays with them all the time. Thank you very much! Great old school set. Bendable and durable.

customer_reviews.title: my kids enjoy them, and my 3yo son loves making Batman ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not pay attention to the size and was expecting them to be taller (my fault, but mentioning it so you'll look if you didn't!). My only other complaint is the capes are thinner than expected, and are a mesh fabric that I'm concerned won't hold up well. That said, my kids enjoy them, and my 3yo son loves making Batman and Wonderwoman kiss. Well, then.

product_meta.title: Justice League Bendable Boxed Set - NJ Croce
product_meta.description:
Greater than the sum of their awe-inspiring parts, The Justice League handles threats too massive for any single hero. Made up of the World's Greatest DC Superheroes, their membership inflates and contracts around each new threat, but these are the top four: Superman, the most powerful hero in the world; Batman, the apex of physical and mental human achievement; Wonder Woman, the Amazon's princess and greatest warrior; and the Green Lantern, an intergalactic cop armed with his own Power Ring.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Justice League Boxed Superheros Set from Toysmith will give your child hours of superhero fun! This set includes Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman and The Green Lantern. Bendable and poseable this figures stand 5" tall. Ages 3 and up.
feature_bullets: Bend and pose your favorite Justice League super heroes
Includes Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, and Green Lantern
Recommended for ages 3 years and up
Includes Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman and The Green Lantern
